attributes.action: Offer parents of miscarried and Stillbirth babies the right to have a Certificate or Teddy bear
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are wanting  our NHS hospitals to offer grieving parents the right to have a certificate or teddy bear when they lose their baby through either miscarrage or stillbirth. I myself have lost a baby due to miscarriage and all we want is our children to be recognised, a simple certificate can bring a grieving parent so much comfort. A life is a life no matter how small
